isReturningFood

public boolean isReturningFood()
Checks to see if the agent has gathered the maximum allowed food and should thus is on its way back to the nest to drop off the carried food.

Returns:
true if the agent cannot carry any more food, false otherwise.

searchForNest

protected Nest searchForNest(ThiefWorld world,
                             double range)
Searches for a close by nest within a specified range.

Parameters:
world - the ThiefWorld reference.
range - the distance to the agent at which the nest is searched for.
Returns:
the closest nest around the nest or null if there is none.

Parameters:

getClosestFoodSource

protected FoodSource getClosestFoodSource(ThiefWorld world,
                                          java.lang.Class<?> foodSourceType)
Check to see if there is a close by food source and if there are multiple, it will choose the closest to the current agent's position.

Parameters:
world - the ThiefWorld reference.
foodSourceType - the type of food source which you are looking for.
Returns:
the closest food source or null if there is none in the agent's range.

Parameters:

foodSource - the food source in which direction the agent must go.
